alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued April 01 at 3:06PM CDT until April 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 106 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA GENEVA HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA HOLMES JACKSON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 19 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER DECATUR EARLY GRADY MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ADEL, ALFORDS, ASHBURN, ASHTON, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BANNOCKBURN, BARKER STORE, BARNEYVILLE, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLAKELY, BLUE SPRINGS, BONIFAY, BOWENS MILL, BOYKIN, BRANCHVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CENTERVILLE, CHULA, COBB CROSSROADS, COLQUITT, COOK CO A/P, COOKTOWN, COTTLE, COTTON, COTTONWOOD, COURTHOUSE, CUBA, DAVIS PARK, DECATUR CO A/P, DILLON, DIXIE, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOTHAN, DOUGLASVILLE, EARLY CO A/P, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, EMPRESS, ENTERPRISE, FADETTE, FAIRCHILD, FITZGERALD, FITZGERALD MUNICIPAL A/P, GAMMAGE, GANER, GENEVA, GENEVA MUNICIPAL A/P, GORDY, GRACEVILLE, GRADY CO A/P, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HACODA, HANOVER, HARDING, HARTFORD, HAWKINSTOWN, HOBBY, HOGGARD MILL, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, IRWINVILLE, ISABELLA, IVEYS MILL, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LEONIA, LITTLE HOPE, LOGAN FIELD MUNICIPAL A/P, LYNN, MALONE, MARIANNA, MASSEE, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, NEW HOPE, NEWTON, OCILLA, PASCO, PELHAM, PINE PARK, PINE VALLEY, QUEENSLAND, QUITMAN, RED ROCK, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, SPENCE AIRPORT, STEINHAM STORE, SUNSWEET, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, TIFTON, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WATERLOO, WEBER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WESTWOOD, AND WORTH.
